text: This game's director teased an announcement related to Opoona in his tweet celebrating the game's 10th (!!!) anniversary. It's been a couple months now and nothing since, but I really hope something materializes. Opoona is easily one of my favorite Wii games, and one of my favorite game soundtracks.
author: SupraDarky

text:
I saw that tweet as well. The same person ( Sachiko Sugimura ) tweeted a couple of weeks ago that it takes a little longer than they expected to give us this "wonderful announcement". I'm having high hopes for it since not only did Sachiko Sugimura change to a profile picture with her dressed as opoona, but she even tweeted about new opoona merchandise.

By the way nice choice! This track is a blast!
author: Eirian Odalis

text: One of the best game I ever played.
author: Ever - Chaine de Let's Play

text: Any news?
author: Hollowed RiceCakes

text: Unfortunately, no, I think the best we could get is a Switch Port, or a remake, but not a sequel.
author: Ever - Chaine de Let's Play

text: @Ever - Chaine de Let's Play Have anyone heard anything more regarding this? I would still be hyped even if it's "just" a remake.
author: YolmzWelra

text:
Actually I just had a look, and Sachiko Sugimura just retweeted the post supra was talking about. Also, an official opoona twitter opened in 2018, and that account made some new tweets just recently as well. Here's hoping that this time around a wonderful announcement will indeed happen soon.


Link to opoona twitter in English: https://translate.googleusercontent.com/translate_c?depth=1&hl=en&ie=UTF8&prev=_t&rurl=translate.google.com&sl=ja&sp=nmt4&tl=en&u=https://twitter.com/opoona_jp&xid=25657,15700023,15700124,15700149,15700186,15700190,15700201,15700214&usg=ALkJrhgTjVkZNRtbCsqPJW7nSWAIkonMWw
author: YolmzWelra

text:
@YolmzWelra I would just LOVE to see a new Opoona announcement ! 

A remake/remaster or a new game, It would be amazing !!
